plot: 077 : Frieza powers up while those present watch in terror; Nail tries to convince Piccolo to merge with him; the battle with Frieza begins.

While the Earthlings confront the evil tyrant Frieza, their wish to bring Piccolo to Namek had been fulfilled. As Piccolo races towards the battle, he stumbles upon a fellow Namekian who faces near death. The wounded Namekian informs Piccolo that a fusion between the two would create newborn power in piccolo that could possibly destroy Frieza.
